scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.build:go:windows-x64: cross-env GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ./bin/win32-x64-gbnf-engine.exe ./gbnf-engine/main.go && chmod 755 ./bin/win32-x64-gbnf-engine.exe
scripts.build:go:windows-arm64: cross-env GOOS=windows GOARCH=arm64 go build -o ./bin/win32-arm64-gbnf-engine.exe ./gbnf-engine/main.go && chmod 755 ./bin/win32-arm64-gbnf-engine.exe
scripts.build:go:linux-x64: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ./bin/linux-x64-gbnf-engine ./gbnf-engine/main.go && chmod 755 ./bin/linux-x64-gbnf-engine
scripts.build:go:linux-arm64: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 go build -o ./bin/linux-arm64-gbnf-engine ./gbnf-engine/main.go && chmod 755 ./bin/linux-arm64-gbnf-engine
scripts.build:go:darwin-x64: cross-env GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ./bin/darwin-x64-gbnf-engine ./gbnf-engine/main.go && chmod 755 ./bin/darwin-x64-gbnf-engine
scripts.build:go:darwin-arm64: cross-env GOOS=darwin GOARCH=arm64 go build -o ./bin/darwin-arm64-gbnf-engine ./gbnf-engine/main.go && chmod 755 ./bin/darwin-arm64-gbnf-engine
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run build:go
